message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_RELATED_REFERENCE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The term, %1s, is already added as a See Also Reference to this term.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A term with Name %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_USEREFERENCE_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Use Reference %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_CODE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A term with Code %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_RELATEDCONCEPT_CODE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A related concept with Code %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CODE_CONTAINS_SPACE
message.locale: Code must not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XFV_MODIFIEDDATE_EARLIER_THAN_CREATIONDATE
message.locale: The Date Last Modified, %1d, must be on or after Date Created, %2d.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_USED_TERM_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The term %1s has been used to index provider services, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CUSTOMTERM_CREATIONDATE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Date Created, %1d, must not be modified if the Custom indicator is set to True.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CUSTOMTERM_MODIFICATIONDATE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Date Created, %1d, must not be modified if the Custom indicator is set to True.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CUSTOMTERM_MODIFICATIONDATE_NOT_CURRENTDATE
message.locale: The Date Created, %1d, must not be modified if the Custom indicator is set to True.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_DELETE_PARENT_TERM
message.locale: This term is the parent term for the following terms, it cannot be deleted. %1s

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CODE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_DEFINITION_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Definition must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_FACET_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Facet must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMY_SCHEMA_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No such schema exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XFV_MUST_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: Search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XFV_SEARCH_CRITERIA_ENTERED_INVALID
message.locale: At least %1n characters must be entered in order to search by keyword.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_MUST_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_TERM
message.locale: At least one taxonomy term must be selected.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_RELATED_CONCEPTS_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: Following Related Concepts are already associated with this term. %1s.

message.name: ERR_USEREFERENCE_FV_USEREFERENCE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Use Reference must be entered.

message.name: ERR_RELATEDTERM_FV_RELATEDTERM_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Please select a term.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_USEREFERENCE_SPECIFIED_ALREADY_EXISTS_TERM
message.locale: The use reference is invalid. A term with the Name %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_MARSHALLING_ERROR
message.locale: The errors encountered while parsing.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_TRANSLATION_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A translation currently exists for the language %1c. Please update the existing translation.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYINEDITTERM_IS_PUBLISHED
message.locale: The term has been published. Please access the term from the published version.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_UPDATED_REQUIRES_REPUBLISHING_REVIST_EDIT_VERSION
message.locale: Please access the in edit version of the term if you wish to update the term details.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_CHANGE
message.locale: At least one change must be selected.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_TERM_TO_REPLACE
message.locale: At least one term must be selected.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CODE_EXCEEDS_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: Code must not exceed %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Term name is not available.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_RELATEDCONCEPT_SPECIFIED_IS_INVALID
message.locale: The Related Concept, %1s, specified for the term is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_RELATEDCONCEPT_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Related Concept name is not available.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_EXTERNALTERM_SPECIFIED_IS_INVALID
message.locale: The External Term, %1s, specified for the term is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_EXTERNALTERM_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: External Term name is not available.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_USEREFERENCE_SPECIFIED_ALREADY_EXISTS_USEREFERENCE
message.locale: Use Reference %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_FV_CUSTOMTERM_CREATIONDATE_NOT_CURRENTDATE
message.locale: The Date Created, %1d, must be the current date for a custom term.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYTERM_XRV_MUST_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_RELATEDCONCEPT
message.locale: At least one related concept must be selected.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_UPDATED_REQUIRES_REPUBLISHING
message.locale: Please access the in edit version of the term if you wish to update the term details.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_SEARCH_RESULT_LIMIT_REFINE_SEARCH
message.locale: %1n records match the search criteria out of which %2n records are displayed. Please refine the search criteria.

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_NAME_CHANGED
message.locale: Name updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_DEFINITION_CHANGED
message.locale: Definition updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_BIBLIOGRAPHIC_REF_CHANGED
message.locale: Bibliographic Reference updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_FACET_CHANGED
message.locale: Facet updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_USE_REF_CHANGED
message.locale: Use References updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_RELATED_CONCEPT_CHANGED
message.locale: Related Concepts updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_RELATED_TERM_CHANGED
message.locale: See Also References updated

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_USER_REVIEW_REQUIRED
message.locale: User review required.

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_USER_ACCEPTED
message.locale: Accepted during user review.

message.name: TEXT_TAXONOMYTERM_USER_REJECTED
message.locale: Rejected during user review.
